name: Cult of the Apocalypse   (version 1 'b')
description: The year is 2053. In the early 21st century, several terrorist factions became nuclear powers. In a play for world power, these factions set off a nuclear chain reaction between nations that resulted In a complete and utter destruction of society and life as we know it today. Mutations, chaos, and terror reigned for years. As people pulled together to form new ruling bodies, they became aware of a group of powerful mutants gathering in a mountain construct and pillaging nearby enclaves. You have been trained and equipped to enter the mutant's area and destroy it.
